verses.verse: That which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5754><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> with our <S%G2257><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> we have looked upon <S%G2300><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> have handled <S%G5584><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, of <S%G4012><s%> the Word <S%G3056><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>;

(For <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shew <S%G518><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> that eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%>;)

That which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5758><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5754><s%> declare we <S%G518><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5725><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> truly our <S%G2251><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> <S%G1161><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> write we <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> <S%G5753><s%> full <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5772><s%>.

This <S%G3778><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the message <S%G1860><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5754><s%> of <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> declare <S%G312><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%> at all <S%G3762><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5725><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%>, we have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> one with another <S%G3326><s%> <S%G240><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> cleanseht <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5719><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> we confess <S%G3670><s%> <S%G5725><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, he is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> just <S%G1342><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G5632><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> our sins <S%G266><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to cleanse <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5661><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>.
